name: heathery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to, or looking or smelling like, heather (= a low, spreading bush that usually has small pink, purple, or white flowers): My grandfather often wore a jacket of warm, heathery tweed. The whisky has a smoky, heathery flavour.
containing heather: If you go a mile down the forest road you will come to a heathery path that leads to the cottage. We spent the afternoon riding our bicycles through the heathery hillside.
